ygData.subject: RE: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: What is a soulstone? I keep hearing about this. But... And yes, the friends are what makes it difficult to leave Everquest. Sarah Heacock   sarah@eskimo.com
ygData.messageBody:
What is a soulstone? I keep hearing about this. But...

And yes, the friends are what makes it difficult to leave
Everquest.
Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 16 Songweaver of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance,Test /
Feyre, level 8 Dark Elf Wizard of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, Test /
Fyere, level 1 Gnome Wizard of Solusek Ro, Test
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
>Sent: Monday, January 24, 2000 11:21 AM

>> about. At later levels having grown up in Sol B and Lower Guk from 35-45
>> you get into sort of a mindset of pull-kill, pull-kill,
>pull-kill. Higher
>> level players sometimes don't use their imaginations about things to do!
>> Here are some suggestions of interesting things for high levels to do for
>> experience:
>
> There are plenty of named NPCs to drop as well, like the Priests of
> Discord, the leader of the Greenbloods(?) in Oggok whose name evades
> me... something like Sonooog. Hell I love Oggok, I've cleared most
> of the bouncers that people have never even heard of before. I've
> gone all the way to the bank to pull ogres heheehe. (most are green
> but the loot is good for buying soulstones ;)
